1.title: Eyebrow Micro Transplant
1.p: Eyebrow transplant microsurgery is an aesthetic procedure aimed at restoring, filling, or defining the eyebrows using hair follicles taken from another part of the body, usually the back of the head. The final result is generally natural, with fuller strands well aligned to the desired shape

lt.title: Full Transplant
lt.p: For those who have lost all eyebrow hair follicles, this surgery aims to implant the complete eyebrow

lt.title: Filling Transplant
lt.p: For those who have partially lost eyebrow hair follicles, this surgery will fill in the existing gaps

2.title: Micro Lifting
2.p: Cosmetic surgical procedures aimed at rejuvenating different areas of the face, reducing wrinkles and sagging with minimally invasive techniques

lt.title: Facial Micro Lifting
lt.p: A cosmetic surgical procedure designed to rejuvenate the face by reducing wrinkles and sagging, especially in the cheeks, jawline, and neck

lt.title: Eyebrow Micro Lifting
lt.p: A less invasive aesthetic procedure focused on the eyebrow and forehead area, providing a subtle and natural lifting effect. It slightly corrects sagging in the eyebrow area and softens forehead lines

lt.title: Upper Lip Micro Lifting
lt.p: Aims to shorten the distance between the lip and nose, making the upper lip more prominent and rejuvenating the area. The upper lip gains a fuller and more defined appearance without the need for fillers

3.title: Micro Cervicoplasty
3.p: A cosmetic procedure aimed at eliminating excess fat accumulated under the chin, creating a more defined chin and neck contour. This procedure is recommended for people who have a double chin due to fat accumulation, and not due to excessive skin sagging or significant muscle changes. Recovery is relatively quick, and most patients can resume daily activities in a few days

4.title: Micro Blepharoplasty
4.p: Minimally invasive cosmetic procedures focused on the eye area, aimed at correcting signs of aging such as excess skin and fat on the eyelids

lt.title: Upper Micro Blepharoplasty
lt.p: This procedure aims to correct signs of aging around the eyes, such as excess skin on the upper eyelids and fat deposits

lt.title: Lower Micro Blepharoplasty
lt.p: A procedure to improve the appearance of fat bags under the eyes and excess skin

lt.title: Upper and Lower Micro Blepharoplasty
lt.p: Minimally invasive cosmetic procedure focused on removing excess skin, fat, or both from the upper and lower eyelids to rejuvenate the eye area

5.title: Micro Otoplasty
5.p: Aims to correct prominent ears by bringing them closer to the head, and improve the shape or contour of the ears, making them more harmonious with the face. The results are permanent, as the ears maintain their new position and shape due to cartilage folding and suturing

lt.title: What Are Cookies?
lt: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit our website. These files allow the website to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or past actions.
Cookies are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the website owners about how users interact with the site.

lt.title: How We Use Cookies
lt.p: Santiclinic uses cookies for various purposes, always aiming to enhance your experience on our website and provide personalized services.

1.title: Website Functionality
lt: Keep your session active during browsing
Store form information for your convenience

2.title: Analysis and Improvement
lt: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
Identify most visited pages and areas of interest

3.title: Marketing and Communication
lt: Display ads relevant to your interests
Measure the effectiveness of our campaigns

lt.title: Types of Cookies
lt.p: We use different types of cookies, each with specific purposes.

lt.title: Necessary Cookies
lt.p: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website. Without them, certain features would not work properly.

lt.title: Analytics Cookies
lt.p: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website, providing information about pages visited, time spent, and other metrics.

lt.title: Marketing Cookies
lt.p: Used to display relevant advertising and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

lt.title: Functional Cookies
lt.p: Enable advanced features like live chat, improved forms, and other personalized features.

4.2.title: Contract Execution

4.3.title: Legitimate Interest
4.3.p: For improving our services, website analysis, and security, we rely on our legitimate interest.

4.4.title: Legal Obligation
4.4.p: Some data is processed to comply with legal obligations, particularly in tax and health matters.

6.2.title: Organizational Measures
lt: Restricted data access on a 'need-to-know' basis

7.title: Data Retention
7.p: Your personal data is retained only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:

7.1.p: Medical data is retained for a minimum of 5 years after the last contact, in accordance with applicable legislation.

7.2.title: Marketing Data
7.2.p: Marketing data is retained until consent is withdrawn or for a maximum period of 3 years without interaction.

7.3.title: Browsing Data

8.title: Your Rights

lt.title: Right to Rectification

lt.title: Right to Erasure
lt.p: You may request deletion of your personal data.

lt.title: Right to Restriction

lt.title: Right to Data Portability
